description: 21 year-old latino-boy Wise Martinez puts on a real show for the camera, as he performs a super hot strip tease, including some time in the bath spraying his gorgeous young brown skin with water. He soon ends up in bed to relieve himself, and erupts in a powerful gusher of hot juice spilling all over his chest.
title: CitiBoyz 16: Stud Pups in Heat, Scene #02
